Slider.name: MinSpeedSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MinSpeed = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MinSpeed') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MinSpeed = tonumber(MinSpeed) if (MinSpeed ~= nil) then if (MinSpeed <= 0) then MinSpeed = 0.001 end else MinSpeed = 0.1 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MinSpeed = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MinSpeedSlider') * MinSpeed

Slider.name: MaxSpeedSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MaxSpeed = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MaxSpeed') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MaxSpeed = tonumber(MaxSpeed) if (MaxSpeed ~= nil) then if (MaxSpeed <= 0) then MaxSpeed = 0.001 end else MaxSpeed = 0.001 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MaxSpeed = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MaxSpeedSlider') * MaxSpeed

Slider.name: MinParticlesSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MinParticles = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MinParticles') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MinParticles = tonumber(MinParticles) if (MinParticles ~= nil) then if (MinParticles <= 0) then MinParticles = 1 end else MinParticles = 0.1 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MinParticles = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MinParticlesSlider') * MinParticles

Slider.name: MinEmissionTimeSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MinEmissionTime = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MinEmissionTime') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MinEmissionTime = tonumber(MinEmissionTime) if (MinEmissionTime ~= nil) then if (MinEmissionTime <= 0) then MinEmissionTime = 0.001 end else MinEmissionTime = 0.001 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MinEmissionTime = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MinEmissionTimeSlider') * MinEmissionTime

Slider.name: MaxEmissionTimeSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MaxEmissionTime = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MaxEmissionTime') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MaxEmissionTime = tonumber(MaxEmissionTime) if (MaxEmissionTime ~= nil) then if (MaxEmissionTime <= 0) then MaxEmissionTime = 0.1 end else MaxEmissionTime = 0.1 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MaxEmissionTime = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MaxEmissionTimeSlider') * MaxEmissionTime

Slider.name: MinAgeSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MinAge = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MinAge') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MinAge = tonumber(MinAge) if (MinAge ~= nil) then if (MinAge <= 0) then MinAge = 0.001 end else MinAge = 0.001 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MinAge = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MinAgeSlider') * MinAge

Slider.name: MaxAgeSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MaxAge = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MaxAge') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MaxAge = tonumber(MaxAge) if (MaxAge ~= nil) then if (MaxAge <= 0) then MaxAge = 0.001 end else MaxAge = 0.001 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MaxAge = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MaxAgeSlider') * MaxAge

Slider.name: MinSizeSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MinSize = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MinSize') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MinSize = tonumber(MinSize) if (MinSize ~= nil) then if (MinSize <= 0) then MinSize = 0.001 end else MinSize = 0.001 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MinSize = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MinSizeSlider') * MinSize

Slider.name: MaxSizeSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MaxSize = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MaxSize') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MaxSize = tonumber(MaxSize) if (MaxSize ~= nil) then if (MaxSize <= 0) then MaxSize = 0.001 end else MaxSize = 0.001 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MaxSize = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MaxSizeSlider') * MaxSize

Slider.name: GravitySlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local Gravity = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('Gravity') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) Gravity = tonumber(Gravity) if (Gravity ~= nil) then else Gravity = 0 end CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_Gravity = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('GravitySlider') * Gravity

Slider.name: MaxVelocidadOndulacionSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MaxVelocidadOndulacion = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MaxVelocidadOndulacion') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MaxVelocidadOndulacion = tonumber(MaxVelocidadOndulacion) if (MaxVelocidadOndulacion ~= nil) then if (MaxVelocidadOndulacion <= 0) then MaxVelocidadOndulacion = 0.001 end else MaxVelocidadOndulacion = 0.001 end LuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MaxVelocidadOndulacion = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MaxVelocidadOndulacionSlider') * MaxVelocidadOndulacion

Slider.name: MinVelocidadOndulacionSlider
Slider.OnChangeValue: local MinVelocidadOndulacion = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('MinVelocidadOndulacion') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) MinVelocidadOndulacion = tonumber(MinVelocidadOndulacion) if (MinVelocidadOndulacion ~= nil) then if (MinVelocidadOndulacion <= 0) then MinVelocidadOndulacion = 0.001 end else MinVelocidadOndulacion = 0.001 end LuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_MinVelocidadOndulacion = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getSliderState('MinVelocidadOndulacionSlider') * MinVelocidadOndulacion

RadioBox.name: EMITTER_TYPE
RadioBox.OnCheckOn: local button = CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getButtonCheckInRadioBox('EMITTER_TYPE') local id = tonumber(CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getGUIManager():getEditableTextBox('EmitterNumber')) if (button == 'EMITTER_ESF') then CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_Type = CParticleEmitter.EMITTER_ESF elseif (button == 'EMITTER_PLANE') then CCoreLuaWrapper().m_CoreInstance:getParticleManager():get_resource_by_id(id).m_Type = CParticleEmitter.EMITTER_PLANE end
